1154:786: tadevaṃ vastuparīkṣāmārgādi saptavidhaṃ mārgamadhikṛtya sarvajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānāḥ saptatriṃśadākārā bhavanti |
1154:791: yaccānimittaṃ nirodho yena cānimittaṃ vikalpāpoḍhena mārgeṇeti kṛtvā nirodhamārgasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ dvitīyamānimittavimokṣamukhaṃ dṛṣṭinimittavikalpapratipakṣaḥ |
1154:792: yattūktamānimittaḥ śamākārairiti tadvastunimittānuviddhaṃ śrāvakamārgamadhikṛtyeti na tenāsya virodhaḥ |
1154:793: anityaduḥkha samudayasatyākārasvabhāvaṃ tṛtīyamapraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ traidhātukapraṇidhānapratipakṣa iti |
1154:796: avibhāvitavibhāvitarūpasaṃjñatvādyathākramamadhyātmaṃ rūpyarūpī pratyātmaṃ dhyānamārūpyasamāpattiṃ vā niḥśritya bahirdhā rūpāṇi suvarṇadurvarṇani paśyatītyetau nirmāṇāvaraṇapratipakṣeṇa dvau vimokṣau |
1154:797: śubhāśubharūpanirmāṇe ca yathāsaṃkhyamābhogaḥ prātikūlyañca saṃkleśastatpratipakṣeṇa śubhaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasampadya viharati |
1154:798: pratyātmaṃ śubhāśubheṣu rūpeṣvanyonyāpekṣāsaṃjñāmanyonyānugamasaṃjñāṃ ca niśrityānyonyaikarasasañjñālābhena yatheṣṭaṃ rūpādhimokṣavibhūtvalābhādityeko vimokṣa iti vimokṣākārāstrayo nirmāṇamārgaḥ |
1154:799: mokṣānukūlavihāramārgasvabhāvāścaturārupyasamāpatyākārāḥ śāntavihāramārgasvabhāvaḥ sañjñāveditanirodhākāra eka iti pañcākārā dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāramārgaḥ |
1154:808: tatra ca mārgo niratiśayatvādeka eva kevalaṃ tu balavaiśāradyādyākārabhedenāsya viśeṣamārgasyāsādhāraṇabhedo vaktavya ityāha |
1154:824: paryāye dharmalakṣaṇe janapadabhāṣāyāṃ dharmaprabhede ca yathākramamadhigamāsvādanajñeyāvaraṇapratighātābhāvena sarvajñānāsaṅgāpratighātitāmupādāya dharmārthaniruktipratibhānapratisaṃvidākārāścatvāraḥ |
1154:829: jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhimārabhya nāsti chandato vīryataḥ smṛtitaḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā vimukteśca sakāśātparihāṇīrityevamākārāḥ ṣaṭ |
1154:833: sarvasya dharmasya buddhairbhagavadbhirbhāṣitasya lakṣaṇārthavaikṛtyādavitathatāmupādāya sarvabuddhabhāṣitatathatākāra ekaḥ |
1154:839: tadevaṃ kṛtvā yathā balādibhirākārāṇāṃ prabhedo yaścaiṣāṃ svabhāvastathatā |
1154:840: yasya ca te sarvadharmavaśavartinaḥ svayambhuvo yadarthañca sarvadharmasarvākārābhisambodhāyeti yathākramaṃ daśa catvāraścatvāro'
1154:841: ṣṭādaśa eka eka ekaścetyekonacatvāriṃśadākārāḥ sarvākārajñatāmārgādhiṣṭhānā bhavanti |
1154:842: yathoktā eva cākārāḥ śrāvakādibhedena sarvākārajñatāyāṃ mārgasatyabhedādavagantavyāḥ |
1154:850: anāsravā eva sarvākārajñatākārāḥ savāsanakleśajñeyāvaraṇaprahāṇena sarvadharmajñānitvāt samyaksambuddhasyetyekatra gaṇyamānaṃ trisaptatyuttaramākāraśatamityākārāḥ |
